sections.title: Introduction & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish interviewee's role in Vesta FinOps operations and relation to Novereon Systems' mission and values.
sample_questions: Can you describe your day-to-day responsibilities within the Vesta FinOps project?
How does your FinOps work align with our values like 'Safety First' and 'Sustainable Velocity'?
What are your primary KPIs in the Operate phase of Vesta FinOps?

sections.title: Current State of Cloud Cost Optimization
sections.goal: Understand the operational metrics, tooling, and processes in place for cost optimization.
sample_questions: Which cost optimization levers have been most effective in the last quarter?
How do you track adherence to policy POL-FIN-007?
Can you walk me through the RB-FIN-007 Idle Resource Reaper runbook and its impact?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify how Vesta FinOps interacts with other projects and departments.
sample_questions: How does Vesta FinOps integrate with Quasar Billing for anomaly detection?
Can you explain a scenario where cost data from Nimbus Observability informed a FinOps decision?
What is the workflow when a cost anomaly triggers a ticket in another project, such as BIL-9324?

sections.title: Forecasting & Budgeting
sections.goal: Explore methods for cost forecasting, budgets, and quota management.
sample_questions: What forecasting models are you currently using for multi-region deployments?
How do you apply the RFC-1502 Resource Quotas & Budgets in operational planning?
Can you give an example of adjusting budgets mid-cycle due to unexpected consumption?

sections.title: Risk Management & Trade-offs
sections.goal: Discuss risk scenarios, trade-offs, and evidence-based decision-making.
sample_questions: What risks do you see if we tighten quotas for Atlas Mobile in pilot phase?
How do you balance cost optimization against SLA commitments, e.g., SLA-ORI-02?
Can you provide an example where cost-saving measures conflicted with performance targets and how you resolved it?

sections.title: Continuous Improvement & Closing
sections.goal: Identify opportunities for process improvements and conclude the interview.
sample_questions: Which runbooks or RFCs would you prioritize for revision in the next quarter?
What metrics would you add to better capture FinOps impact?
Any final thoughts on scaling Vesta FinOps practices across more projects?
